a1: I think that they are over-rated
q2: I think Real Madrid are the best team in Spain.
a2: I agree with it, at times it is the best
q3: What team is better than Real Madrid?
a3: Barcelona FC is better than Real Madrid by far; especially now with Ronaldo out.
q4: Which team do you honestly think can compete with Barcelona FC?
a4: I think that Real Madrid is the direct rival of Barcelona in this league
q5: Do you think that the players get along when they meet?
a5: I believe they do, unless they have personal problems with each other
